(1, 1, 1): Crohn syndrome, regional enteritis, Leśniowski-Crohn's disease
(3, 1, 1): Abdominal pain, diarrhea (may be bloody), fever, weight loss
(4, 1, 1): Anemia, skin rashes, arthritis, bowel cancer
(9, 1, 1): Irritable bowel syndrome, celiac disease, Behçet's disease, nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug enteropathy, intestinal tuberculosis
